titleStmt.title: A guide to goe to God: or, An explanation of the perfect patterne of prayer, the Lords prayer. By William Gouge, B. in D. and minister of Gods Word in Black-Friers London
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] and R. B[adger] for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold at his shop neere the great north dore of St. Pauls Church, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere the great north dore of St. Pauls Church, at the signe of the Bible
